title: Leona or Diana. Who'd win?
body:
Okay.
If you already know, the NA server has already conducted this. Seriously. You check out the NA site, and it'll b dere.
Anyway.
Who'd win?
I just want an OCE vote.

replies.body: {{champion:131}}
{{champion:89}}
{{champion:136}}
{{champion:17}} Game on.

Star Dragon vs Rat

Screw Batman VS Superman, we got the real show right here! xD
I think that if Leona was trying to kill Diana that she would win because Diana has such low HP and Leona has tons of stuns
in reality diana would win in a fight to the death, because leo wouldnt want to kill her, therefore forfeigting

I don't see it being stated as a 'fight to the _death_' anywhere? 

anyway Leo would probably not want to kill Diana, but does she strike you as the type to just give up? If it is a fight to the death then someone has to die, and i somehow doubt Leona would give up and surrender her head.
diana would win a real fight leo should win an ingame fight.

Why would Diana win a real fight?

And Pretty sure Diana would win the in game fight,
{{item:3027}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3115}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3020}} {{item:3151}} or {{item:3146}} (if you want some sustain for the fight)
along with her passive gives some pretty decent health and sustained damage (not to mention her already powerful burst) with magic pen.

{{item:3190}} {{item:3401}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3222}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3083}} 
is probably a normalish build for vsing pure AP (except that a real Leona would have a sightstone)

Leona does very little damage (especially without her sunfire cape) sure she can keep Diana stunned for a decent length of time during the fight, but she cant really do much to her during that time.

meanwhile Diana can pop her burst several times during the fight, and be constantly whittling away with Nashors, lich bane and her passive, if you swap liandries for gun blade, you've got a lot of sustain (but less Magic pen, but a also little bit of AD)

i just don't see how Leo is supposed to win? Its not like she can use a thorn mail like she can again ADC's
build right can get about 400 mr and decent damage
Whats the build then? and can it stand up to full magic pen and sustained damage?
granted, was before the nerf to mr items

I think it is talking about the lore rather than in-game, anyway Diana has more sustained damage and Leo has no damage, so if it was a full built 1v1 fight in game , its probably more likely the Diana would win.

I believe {{champion:131}} would win, purely based off lore.

She was raised as one of the Solari, receiving the same training as {{champion:89}}  before she went off and started to praise the moon and trained as the once extinct Lunari. 

Also, Diana doesn't exclusively worship the moon. She is the embodiment, but her training and upbringing has her still believe in the Sun god.

Also, unconfirmed whether it is same god with two phases or two separate gods, by indication of in-game quotes.

I dont know if the Celestial Aspects are 'Gods' or not.

But Aurelion Sol's quote to Diana "You and Leona embody the same light, typical Targon redundancy."
indicates there may be some crossover between Sun and Moon aspects and their powers/intentions.

Im assuming this is lore related, and not in-game? Because {{champion:131}}  has some good sustained damage and {{champion:89}}  has like... negative damage.

First off, the thing that most people forget: {{champion:89}}  has fucktons of armour AND a huge magical shield, {{champion:131}}  has light armour and no shield. 
This puts {{champion:89}}  at an advantage straight off the bat, It's like a fencer up against a Knight in shining armour. 
If we examine their powers, {{champion:89}}'s power supposedly comes from the Sun, {{champion:131}}'s power supposedly comes from the moon, and like VENI VIDI VICI pointed out, the light of the moon is only light reflected from the sun. Not to mention the surface area of the moon is significantly smaller than the surface area of the sun. However it is unlikely that the two champions can draw upon ALL the energy of their respective celestial bodies, so lets assume they can draw the same amount of power from each body. If the two champions can draw the same amount of power from each body, and the two powers met full force (like a DragonBall Z beam fight) its likely that {{champion:89}}  would win due to the sun outshining the moon (if you got sunlight and moonlight and shone them on the same spot the golden sunlight colour would wash away the whiter tones of the moonlight) 
So considering {{champion:89}}  has more armour, pretty much the same weapon (a single handed sword), a giant magical shield AND her power source is stronger. It'd be my guess that She would win. Yes its true, {{champion:89}}  probably wouldn't want to kill {{champion:131}} , but you don't need to kill someone to beat them. 

Plus {{champion:136}} would probably Vote for {{champion:89}} (if he was forced to choose) because she is using the power of a Star and not the power of a floating piece of rock, and he does so love stars, plus he has seen and knows pretty much everything, so I trust his vote.

Lorewise - di she already cut down hundreds of solari, leo would just be one more
Gamewise - leo she's a tank, like what would a di do 100 points then get destroyed by leo's constant cc

TEAM DI ALL THE WAY

Leona.. The Sun gives the moon energy yo. If we could harness one square centimetre of the Sun's energy we'd have enough power to run the whole world for years.. I'd associate Diana with spirits and Nocturnal animals though (just being creative)

Diana because she has more motivation to win and wouldn't hesitate to go as hard out as she could or to kill Leona, I feel like Leona is the type of person that has the enemy on the ground then goes to spare their life only for them to kill her after she turns her back the next time.
Bit of context ?
